DOC.brief_summary: Is anything gain give antibiotic prophylaxis remove ureteric stent cystoscopically stone surgery ?
DOC.brief_title: Antibiotic Prophylaxis When Removing Ureteric Stent After Stone Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Many patient undergo stone surgery receive ureteric stent remove 14 day . This stent remove cystoscopically today do without give antibiotic . Some patient get urinary tract infection subject . However investigator know many patient get UTI follow primary care doctor . With study investigator would like find whether possible avoid infection also find many actually get infect .
DOC.criteria: stone surgery patient ureteric stent remove 14 day ongoing antibiotic treatment , allergy trimetoprimsulfa
